main event: A radar target at Westover AFB in Massachusetts exhibited fast acceleration, the ability to make a 180-degree turn in less than 6 seconds, and rapid changes in speed in 1956.
interesting points: The target was larger than an ordinary radar target.
The target made a 180-degree turn in less than 6 seconds.
The target was able to increase and decrease its speed in a matter of seconds.
All other air traffic in the area was accounted for.
The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes.
